site:  couldbe domain
site:nbc.com, site:.gov
<search string> site:edu filetype:pdf
https://support.google.com/websearch/answer/2466433?hl=en
*  '-' dash
  to exclude words/sites from your search results
jaguar speed -car or pandas -site:wikipedia.org
*  '"'  double quotes for exact phrase
  use asterisk for wildcards.
  Example: "imagine all the people", "imagine * people"
